message.heading: Oh. One other thing. If you guys ever have kids, and one of them, when he's eight years old, accidentally sets fire to the living room rug... go easy on him.

Modi vel optio delectus alias ratione repudiandae. Voluptate ea fugit. Voluptatem provident enim maxime minus est. Sed aspernatur rerum. Sapiente provident harum est.

message.heading: I can't believe you'd loan me your car without telling me it had a blind spot. I could've been killed!
